text: Reads the value of a detail attribute value from a geometry.
When running in the context of a node (such as a wrangle SOP), this argument can be an integer representing the input number (starting at 0) to read the geometry from.
Alternatively, the argument can be a string specifying a geometry file (for example, a
) to read from. When running inside Houdini, this can be an
The name of the attribute (or intrinsic) to read.

The last argument is always ignored.
    It is just there so you can change a prim/point/vertex call (which each have an element number argument) to a detail call by changing the name without having to change the arguments as well.
if importing the attribute failed, or the value of the attribute on success.

title: detail
summary: Reads the value of a detail attribute value from a geometry.
